Package uk.co.silentsoftware.config

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicLoader
    Placeholder class for video/slideshow basic loader names and paths
    LanguageSupport
    Basic text only internationalisation support.
    OptionsObject
    The backing object behind the OptionDialog, holding the particular user configuration.
    PersistenceService
    Simple XStream wrapper for saving the preferences via persisting (and restoring) the OptionObject
    ScalingObject
    Backing object behind scaling options holding the actual dimensions used by the BufferedImage scaling method.
    SpectrumDefaults
    ZX Spectrum constants
    UTF8Control
    UTF8 capable resource bundleloader
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GigaScreenHSBOption
    Enum storing screen attribute ordering modes, e.g "Brightness" would group whichever screen's attributes were darker on screen 1.
